content.en: Image authentication: Researchers have been exploring the development of robust image hashing algorithms for image authentication. These algorithms are designed to resist content tampering while maintaining sensitivity to content-preserving operations. The proposed algorithms have shown better performances in terms of rotation robustness, discrimination, and classification compared to existing algorithms.
content.da: Billedautentifikation: Forskere har undersøgt udviklingen af robuste billed-hashing-algoritmer til billedautentifikation. Disse algoritmer er designet til at modstå manipulation af indholdet, mens de bevarer følsomhed over for indhold-bevarende operationer. De foreslåede algoritmer har vist bedre ydeevne hvad angår rotationsrobusthed, diskriminering og klassifikation sammenlignet med eksisterende algoritmer.
